answers.answer: I took my glucose test at 9 AM and had my 4D ultrasound at 1 left the hospital around 2:30ish and on my way home my dr called and told me i failed it...
I have my 1 hour test at 9am! I'm nervous lol

I failed it and had to do the 3 hour test and failed it too! Was diagnosed with gestational diabetes, it ***** because I gotta be on a diet and i can't have sugar but as long as my princess is healthy thats all that matters! Im 34+1 now so not much longer for me lol good luck on your test and dont be nervous :) its really not that bad! worst part was not being able to eat until it was over, i was starving! Lol
the ***** was supposed to be   s u c k s   lol
Ahhh thank you! I will definitely try not to stress lol my little girl loves sweets though!! Lol

Your Dr should have results later that day or early the next. Getting tested for GD isn't bad and if you fail having it is not bad either. You'll just be put on a very healthy diet which is good during pregnancy. It's the cravings that bother most. Just remember who and what it's for and it'll all be worth it.

yep :) my daughter definitely enjoyed the sweets before i found out! I never knew how bad I'd crave sweets when i couldn't have them lol but I definitely stick to the diet because I dont want her having problems

question: How long does it take to get results of the 1 hour glucose test?
title: glucose tolerance test
